comment: He is genuinely the best professor I have taken!!!! There is no work overload and explains the criteria for all the assignments. He grades very lenient. If you need to email him about anything he will respond pretty quick. Definitely recommend
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Extremely easy professor. I am pretty sure everything was just a completion grade, I received full credit for every assignment I submitted. No reason anyone should make below an A in this class.

Take his class(es)! He is very funny and gives good lectures. He assigns a good bit of homework each week, but allows unlimited attempts on each part. If you fall behind, just talk to him and he will understand and help. Tests are no lockdown browser and open note, he wants you to succeed. Attendance recommended, but not part of grade.

You have two weeks to complete a lot of work but everything is assigned in advanced every other Wed (so, no surprise). What I like is that you work at your own pace. Dr. G was very quick to respond to emails and met with me outside of class when I had issues. He's quick to grade and VHL homework are graded on completion. He's very hands-off.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: He assigned tons of vhl homework and tests but overall not bad at all. Partner work via online was kinda a headache but it was nice seeing my fellow virtual peers. Take his advice of allocating time throughout the week to do hw. He was very handsoff when it came to the content so it's very much self-study but was accessible through email.
TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!! So easy and fun, unlike any class I've ever taken and I loved it.n
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I took his online Love and Sex class and really enjoyed it! There are 10 discussion posts but you only have to do 5. Portfolio assignments spread throughout the semester and a project at the end. Each week we would read a chapter of the textbook, watch a video, and/or read an article. The material was interesting and course load very manageable!

One passage read per week with questions to go along with it made the class very easy. Each week the reading was discussed, so confusing parts were cleared up. The topics of the reading were also very interesting and relevant to modern life, so the vocabulary is very useful. Super easy class, and good feedback on every assignment.

He's very chill and honestly wants you to improve in French. The topic he talks about in class are very interesting. His FREN3200 class was one day in person and two days online, so it was pretty chill. Definitely recommend taking.

I've had Dr. Guglielmi twice, and he makes everything very easy and gives out few assignments. He's super entertaining and funny, and above all, he is very understanding! I know he teaches Love and Sex as well, so I'm looking forward to taking that course with him!

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. He is genuinely one of the best teachers i've ever had. I took a 6 credit french class. He made it so enjoyable and super easy. I learned so much. The homework does take a few hours but the quizzes and tests are completely based on the homework. Also you'll definitely want to go to class because he is so much fun!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: This was one of my favorite classes that I took this semester. He is an amazing professor and left a lot of the work open to our own creativity. Although attendance was not required, I really enjoyed going to this class anyway! Would recommend anyone to take his class!

Professor Guglielmi is a great professor overall. He is very respectful and has great lectures/guest speakers throughout the semester. If you participate in every assignment thats required, youll pass this class. I would recommend going in person although its not required.

An AMAZING professor! Even with it being online, he felt very personable. He was extremely encouraging and respectful in his feedback which made me excited and comfortable in his class. His work made you think but was not overwhelming and he made you feel like he really wanted you to succeed. I left his class feeling like I truly learned something!

One of the nicest professors I have ever had. He does not overwork his students at all, and he is very easy to reach by email. The course content is easy, but there are still opportunities to learn and broaden your views. I would take him again!

The BEST professor I have ever had. He is so caring and would even let me submit an assignment for full credit after it was due. You pretty much just have discussions due every week and 6 portfolio assignments that are very easy with a project at the end that is also easy. The assignments are easy because this class consists of love and sex.
Such an easy class! We'd have one weekly assignment that only took about 15-20 mins to complete and I got 100 on every one. He's super nice and understanding and really cares about all students.

I loved this man as my professor. He really engages with the students and forms bonds with them, which is hard during the Covid online school stuff. Also, 0 exams. Just stuff for a portfolio project that's super easy where you get to pick the topic.

One of the best professors I have ever had. Excellent teacher. There is a lot of homework for this class (since it is accelerated) and content to cover, but he is very understanding and makes the learning fun. Would recommend him to anyone studying French.
Great class, the course content is great, I wish everyone would take this class. Professor G is really cool too, we got a lot of interesting guest speakers. No tests, only two projects. 10/10

Dr. Guglielmis class is a definite easy A. His presentations really keep everyone engaged and the workload is very light. There are no tests at all. The final and midterm were both group projects. My only complaint is he does have a bit of a strong personality. I didnt always feel comfortable enough to speak my opinion in this class.
One of my favorite professors. The homework is fun and easy, and his lectures are interesting and hilarious.

Do the work and you'll pass. I literally got a 100. We only took one test (midterm) and the final was a video project. One of the easiest classes you can take at KSU and he is absolutely hilarious. Take the sex and culture learning community. It is an amazing class and should be a university requirement.
Professor G is really funny and cares about his students. KSU1101 is a pretty easy class, so it's not hard to pass.
He's such a great professor! Very lively and helpful through out class. He is always very animated and very passionate about his job. I will take him again next semester for sure!

Dr. Luc is a riot. Class is always fun because of him cracking jokes all the time. Makes things that are difficult lighthearted and fun. Hard not to make at least a B in his class unless you do nothing. We go through a lot in this class but he makes it easy to understand and doesn't make you feel overwhelmed. Would highly recommend taking him!

It's a reading class so there's lots of reading assignments. There are quizes on conjugations, but once you understand them they are easy. No tests except the final, which was questions the students wrote and submitted. Really nice guy and super funny. Also if you're sensitive to triggers about suicide/depression be ready cause he doesn't hold back
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Prof. Guglielmi was an overall good professor. I think because he is usually an upper level professor it was a bit more difficult than need be. He is a really good guy who wants to help you. We had 4 test (final included), 2 quizzes, 2 speaking grades, and 4 redactions. Final is just unit 8.

He was awesome. For his first time teaching a freshman seminar, he did well. We had one test, the midterm that was a piece of cake as long as you had been to class. We had a ton of guest speakers, which I enjoyed. We had a lot of lectures, but our topic made it more interesting. Would take him again. Super easy.
Great teacher. Really knows his stuff and is very willing to help you whenever. He's one of my favorite French professors at KSU.

Easiest class ever.  Do the short readings and the simple homework (an hour, max), show up for class, and you're good to go.  A few short writing assignments leniently graded and a few easy conjugation quizzes - that's it.  No way not to get an A unless you just blow it off.  Professor is engaging with a sarcastic wit.   Fun class.

Very down-to-earth, funny, likable professor! Perceived as harsh (ridiculing those who don't try) but not in a mean way (it's all comedy, in good spirits). Native speaker from Belgium. Truly a French lit course. No tests for us, only writing assignments (which you can improve & he takes avg). Informs well about assignments (quizzes) and syllabus.

Great and hilarious professor; fair grader and always makes class interesting. He's helpful if you really need it but has no remorse embarrassing you in class if you forget something! Great teacher, highly recommend him for French classes as often as you can take him.

Probably the best French teacher Kennesaw has. I continually looked forward to class and found myself working harder in that class simply because of how much I enjoyed it.  Fair grader but gives ample opportunity to improve. Great teacher.  Absolute must.

French has always been my favorite subject, but Luc made learning french so fun and entertaining, I have now decided to make it my Minor! I HIGHLY recommend him because he is so enthusiastic and entertaining in all his classes and also very helpful in explaining exactly what to do to succeed in French as well as his class.
Great teacher! very helpful! Funny! loves to teach! Wants everyone to understand grammar. tests are easy, papers are hard, but is a very fair grader. Wish I could take more classes with Dr. G!

Dr. G is incredibly sexy. Sometimes it is hard for me to attend class because he wears his tight black jeans and his turtle neck shirts, and it drives me wild. I love looking at his hairy chest. He is a great teacher. Bet he is an even better tutor. Yummy!

He is a Prof who cares for ALL his students!  He is hilarious and will do everything for his students. He is crystal clear with his assignments and even gives a take home test! He is a total FUNNY French/Belgian! He cares for ALL his students and if you are struggling will help you!  F students will get C's or B's and you will understand French!!!!
AMAZING teacher. I love him. I'm not very good with languages but he is great. Extremely nice and funny. Very helpful too. Made the class 10x better. Highly recommend.

Teacher is easy, but we saw more Vainer in class than him, he was gone a lot ... it was nice that we had a sub but sometimes confusing ... I think teachers should or teach or research ...I did not feel teaching was his priority ... too bad, he is good at it.
Dr. G is so amazing. really funny guy and is willing to help you with anything. he makes the classes interesting and you will want to go back every time. and it helps that hes cute ;) TAKE HIM!
A great class with a great professor.  He made the whole semester fun.

This is my fourth semester in French with Dr. G.  I have changed my entire schedule to be sure to be in his class.  He is funny, makes class enjoyable, jokes a lot (u MUST have a great sense of humor, or take somebody else), he's passionate about his teaching and WILL help you out, very professional, native, well, you get the idea: TAKE HIM.

Awesome professor!! I have taken him since French 1001. He is difficult, but reasonable. He jokes around and makes class interesting and light-hearted. He truly wants you to do well and really cares about his students. If you are sensitive and don't like being the brunt of good-natured jokes, don't take him.
Professor Guglielmi is oen of the best French professors at KSU. He is very clear with his expectations for the class and is very thorough. He is easy if you do the work.

By far the best french teacher I have ever had! Extremely fun class and he really helps you learn what you are studying. As long as you attempt to study for tests and keep up with the online homework assignments (not bad at all) you can easily make an A

I have been taking French for 7 years, and Dr. Guglielmi is by far the best French teacher I have had. His class is a lot of fun, and it was refreshing to take the language from a native speaker. Highly reccommended, would take again!
He is a very unique person and has a different perspective on the world due to his strong European background.  He always included culture in his lessons and made the class interesting.
So very helpful and flexible. Unique style and presentation that is very easy to follow. A great teacher, native speaker, always willing to go the extra mile for you. DEFINITE SEX APPEAL!

Guglielmi is one of the best teachers I've had at KSU. He is especially good at recognizing and responding to the various skill levels of his students. I strongly suggest enrolling in classes taught by full time faculty members. Guglielmi is easy to locate on campus and focused on his students' progress. Ferrani is nice, but pretty apathetic.

He is a really great professor. He is a very funny and lite humored person. He has a great personality which makes the time spent in his classroom very enjoyable. He is very intelligent and he knows how to relate the material. He is a great professor for the 1st time French student or for the 4th year French student. He is always open for meetings.
